reqs:
Pre-reqs: MICB 302 and one of MICB 402, MEDG 410.
This class will be held in the Life Sciences Centre (LSC), room 1410 (effective May 16, 2016).
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
description: Presentations, library research, paper reviews and class discussion on selected areas of advanced molecular and cellular immunological research.
